name: BLOCK-T539
configuration_schema:
$schema: http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#
title: BLOCK-T539 configuration
description: Configuration for BLOCK-T539.
type: object
properties:
  rotation_angle:
    description: Rotation angle.
    type: number
    default: 70
  elevation:
    description: Elevation angle.
    type: number
    default: 70
  azimuth:
    description: Azimuth angle.
    type: number
    default: 70
  maxiter:
    description: Number of iterations for the closed-loop.
    type: number
    default: 5
  block_note:
    description: A note about the block
    type: string
    default: "closed_loop_22dof_trunc12"
  truncation:
    description: Truncation index to use for the estimating the state.
    type: number
    default: 12
